General.Name: Vietnam Container Shipping JSC
General.Description: Vietnam Container Shipping Joint Stock Corporation provides logistics solutions in Vietnam. The company operates VIP GREENPORT seaport systems and services; and a container depot, which offers various services in the field of container delivery, container cleaning, container repair, container GOH, and reefer. It also provides warehouse; road transportation; shipping and forwarding agents; and logistic services. The company was formerly known as North Vietnam Container Shipping Company and changed its name to Vietnam Container Shipping Joint Stock Corporation in 2002. Vietnam Container Shipping Joint Stock Corporation was founded in 1985 and is based in HaiPhong, Vietnam.
